name: Troll War II
overview: A type-in game so vast it had to be released in two issues of A.N.A.L.O.G. Computing Magazine issues 57 and 58, of September and October 1987. Where Troll war was a single player shooter that feels a little bit like Plants vs. Zombies A two-player fantasy warfare game by Scott Langston. Troll War II is a two-player game, in which trolls war with wizards. The game consists of each player taking a turn, during which armies may be moved, enemies may be attacked, and the opponent's castle may be stormed. The game is over when your opposition's king is captured. Trolls are controlled by joystick 0, and wizards by joystick 1. Trolls move first. On the main screen, the troll's castle is located in the upper left, and the wizard's castle in the lower right.
